data: {"generalSituation":"Winds will be weak over the coast of Guangdong today. Under the persistent influence of a dry northeast monsoon, the weather will be mainly fine over Guangdong for the rest of this week and early next week. It will be mild during the day with relatively large temperature difference between day and night. Another intense northeast monsoon is expected to reach southern China midweek next week. Temperatures will fall over the region. Besides, the area of low pressure now over the seas east of the Philippines will develop gradually in the next few days, and bring unsettled weather to the region.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260113","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"Light winds force 2.","forecastWeather":"Mainly fine apart from some haze. Cool in the morning.
